title: AttributeError: module 'bert' has no attribute 'Layer'
body:
AttributeError: module 'bert' has no attribute 'Layer'

In embeddings.py should be "from bert.layer import Layer" not "import bert" as bert is a directory that reside in a directory bert-for-tf2.

Here is the error:

AttributeError: module 'bert' has no attribute 'Layer'
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-20-17e82128f301> in <module>
     13 import bert
     14 #from bert import *
---> 15 from bert.model import BertModelLayer
     16 from bert.loader import StockBertConfig, map_stock_config_to_params, load_stock_weights
     17 #from bert.tokenizer.bert_tokenization import FullTokenizer

~\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python39\lib\site-packages\bert\model.py in <module>
     10 
     11 from bert.layer import Layer
---> 12 from bert.embeddings import BertEmbeddingsLayer
     13 from bert.transformer import TransformerEncoderLayer
     14 

~\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python39\lib\site-packages\bert\embeddings.py in <module>
     15 
     16 
---> 17 class PositionEmbeddingLayer(bert.Layer):
     18     class Params(bert.Layer.Params):
     19         max_position_embeddings  = 512

AttributeError: module 'bert' has no attribute 'Layer'




PLEASE CORRECT ME IF UM WRONG,
